mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, password, name, email, phone_number, auth) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{auth});
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT mem_num FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND password = #{password}
SELECT password FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
